page.title: 08TRADE
page.content: { Central Avenue}is our main shopping centre in{West Bridgford.}There are lots of different shops. They are mainly food shops, but some sell toys, clothes, videos and furniture. There are several shops joined together in a great long row. {Asda}is a very big shop where lots of things are sold under one roof. People walk round with shopping trolleys and help themselves from the shelves. Then they have to queue up at one of the check-outs to pay for their things. In the summer Asda has gardening things near the entrance but in the winter they are replaced by toys. There is a cafe inside Asda where you can have a drink or some food. Outside there is a petrol station. There are several small shops around West Bridgford too.
